title: Snow White and the Queen
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,552 words, Level W (Grade 4), Lexile 800L
description: Who do you think is the most beautiful person in the world? In Snow White and the Queen, Snow White's new stepmother simply needs to be the most beautiful person in the world and will stop at nothing to make sure that she remains the most beautiful. Students will enjoy this classic fairy tale with loveable characters and charming illustrations, and they will be engaged with a few new plot twists. This book can also be used to teach students how to make, revise, and confirm predictions as well as to analyze characters and use commas to separate dialogue.
